summary: Comprehensive testing of Right Tech Centre LMS completed. Backend APIs working well (94.1% success rate), frontend UI functional with proper navigation, course catalog, and authentication. Minor issues with AI Chat timeout and admin dashboard access.

flaky_endpoints.impact: AI Tutor functionality may be slow

integration_issues.issue: Admin user redirected to student dashboard instead of admin dashboard

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and 57+ programs stats
Course Catalog loads with 57 courses correctly
Course filtering by type (diploma: 26, bachelor: 16, certification: 15)
Search functionality works on courses page
Login page with admin credentials works
AI Tutor page loads (shows login requirement correctly)
About page loads with proper content and stats
Analytics API working for admin users

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (most features working, minor admin access issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin dashboard routing - admin users should be redirected to /admin instead of /dashboard. Investigate AI Chat timeout issue (may need to increase timeout or optimize AI response time).
